description_text:
HI
I am: Kien Le
As in the previous email you said the commissions will be paid at the end
of the month, today has passed the month and I still have not received my
payment, I hope you will consider the problem and pay me. so that I have
more funds to re-optimize my advertising campaign, as well as feel more
secure in introducing simsonn products to more potential customers.
Wish you a happy and successful new month.
Sincerely thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi KIÊN LE,  We will adjust the payment date to the beginning of each month to facilitate the settlement of last month's commission. We will arrange for priority payment for you today.

Dear Kien,   I have submitted your commission payment request to our manager. In addition, your sales target has reached the 15% commission rate standard. You can provide the following information, and we will provide you with a commission rate of up to 15% after approval! 1. Advertising channel description; 2. Search for your advertisement in the Ad Library and send us a screenshot;    Fb: https://www.facebook.com/ads/library    Google Ads: https://adstransparency.google.com/ 3. Screenshot of your advertising backend data (July data).  ​     We look forward to a good and sustainable cooperation in the future.     Best regards,  Simsonn

I am using Google Ads to promote products through search and display
campaigns. Ads are targeted by relevant keywords and reach potential
customers. I monitor the effectiveness daily to optimize budget and
conversion rate.

In addition, our team is also testing ads on personal YouTube and Facebook
channels, although the results are not as expected at the moment. We will
continue to optimize these channels in the future.

Currently, I am also cooperating very effectively with Fanatec.com - a
partner specializing in providing racing simulation equipment. Traffic and
conversion rates here are very high.

If we are able to increase the commission to 15%, the team will focus on
testing ads targeting customers with similar behaviors to those who
regularly create conversions at Fanatec.com.

AND below I have attached my ad image as requested by you.
It's a pleasure to work with you.
tran trong.[image: image.png]

Vào Th 6, 1 thg 8, 2025 vào lúc 15:25 service@simsonn.com <

Hi KIÊN LE,    Okay, we will review your information on Monday!

[image: image.png]Hello SIMSONN support team
I would like to ask about the 15% commission increase that you proposed. I
would like to know if I am eligible for that commission?
To show my goodwill for long-term cooperation.I will rate 5 stars with a
positive status every week.
I hope to receive positive feedback from you soon.
Thank you very much.

Vào Th 7, 2 thg 8, 2025 vào lúc 17:50 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> đã viết:

> Hi KIÊN LE,
>
> Okay, we will review your information on Monday!
>
>

Hi KIÊN LE,    Thank you for your excellent work! We apologize for the delay, but your request has been approved by our manager, and we have adjusted your commission rate to 15%! We hope you will continue your excellent work!

Hello
I am very happy to receive your message. We always try our best to achieve
the best results in our advertising campaigns.[image: image.png]
Best regards

Hi KIEN LE, we cannot find your review of our website.In addition, we are confused because our customer just paid for a price difference link that we sent directly to he, but it shows that the order came from your promotional link.

Hi

Sorry for the delay in replying to your email.

I have checked the new order via email and it is true that my order has
been shipped.

Regarding your website review on trustpilot.com, after checking again, our
review is not working, and my team will fix the problem soon and get a
positive review every week.

Wishing you and the support team a nice weekend
best regards

Hello Support
It seems like my ad link is having problems? It's been almost a week and
the dashboard hasn't received any new orders even though I've targeted my
ads to potential customers. I think there's something unusual here. Could
you please review it and see if there's anything wrong?
Thank you very much
